page.title: 14MARBLES.
page.content: At school there are many types of games the most popular at the moment is {MARBLES}.There are many different sorts of marbles.Sometimes the good marbles can be layed up for larger numbers.Layed up means put on a line and you must fire from the number of squares the layer up says.{MARBLES}are various sizes an our glass balls with different streaks of colour inside.Some have interesting names like {RAINBOW WARRIORS}because they look like oil in water.Some are just glass balls and are dear.there are also {" SPIDERS "}which have a whirly pattern inside them.
